meanings: (말투가 날카로운 모양) snap (at), say sharply[curtly], (informal) bite[snap] one's head off
It is like a shot arrow and spilt water

vlive.korean: [행복으로 쏘아 올린 작은 홉] 행복! [j-hope goes up in the air with happiness] Happiness! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.84

vlive.korean: 쏘아 올린 쪼매난 공이 뭐예요? What does "the post shot up" mean? 듣기 View video 김상균 (KIM SANG GYUN) : [김상균] Happy BirthDay 🎂 (feat.곰됴디 쥔장 생일)

examples.korean: They raked the streets with machine-gun fire. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 기관총으로 거리를 훑듯이 쏘아 대었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They raked the streets with machine-gun fire. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The children were squirting each other with water from the hose. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아이들은 호스로 서로에게 물을 쏘아 대고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The children were squirting each other with water from the hose. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She gave him a sullen glare. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 뚱하니 그를 쏘아 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: We heard the sound of guns firing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 총을 쏘아 대는 소리를 들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The ship sent up distress flares to attract the attention of the coastguard. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 배는 해안 경비대의 관심을 유도하기 위해 조난 신호탄을 쏘아 올렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The ship sent up distress flares to attract the attention of the coastguard. Add to Wordbook
